paraphrase: int. 喂，你好（用于问候或打招呼）；喂，你好（打电话时的招呼语）；喂，你好（引起别人注意的招呼语）；<非正式>喂，嘿 (认为别人说了蠢话或分心)；<英，旧>嘿（表示惊讶）
n. 招呼，问候；（Hello）（法、印、美、俄）埃洛（人名）
v. 说（或大声说）“喂”；打招呼
sentence: You say "Hello" to someone when you meet them. 你好 (打招呼用语)
[套语]
Hello, Trish. I won't shake hands, because I'm filthy.
你好，特里斯。我就不握手了，我的手好脏。
Hello is also a noun. 招呼
N-COUNT
The salesperson greeted me with a warm hello.
那位推销员向我打了个热情的招呼。
You say "Hello" to someone at the beginning of a telephone conversation, either when you answer the phone or before you give your name or say why you are phoning. 喂 (打电话时的招呼语)
[套语]
A moment later, Cohen picked up the phone. "Hello?"
一会儿之后，科恩拿起电话。“喂？”
You can call "hello" to attract someone's attention. 喂 (用于唤起别人注意)
CONVENTION
Very softly, she called out: "Hello? Who's there?"
她很轻柔地喊道：“喂？谁在那儿？”

paraphrase: abbr. 太长不读（too long; didn't read）
n. <非正式>（对文章、讨论的问题等的）要点总结，扼要概述（同TL;DR）

sentence: 今天我背单词了吗？
Did I recite words today?
他们从始至终都在背单词和学语法基础。
From start to finish he's learning vocabulary and fundamentals of grammar.
李信喜欢背单词。
Li Xin likes to learn words by heart.
(in Japan) a carved toggle, esp of wood or ivory, originally used to tether a medicine box, purse, etc, worn dangling from the waist (在日本木头的或象牙的)坠子; 最初用于拴住药盒、钱包等，悬挂于腰际
N
We got the bus back to Tange for 30 cents.
我们以30美分乘公共汽车回到了坦格。
So now I hit enter and voila!
好，我要点回车了，瞧！
Voila, the message shows up.
瞧，消息出现了。
And voila, the result is culture.
瞧文化就这样应运而生了。

paraphrase: v. 重定（税收、价格指数等）的基准
sentence: Complete the rebase operations as often as possible.
尽可能经常地完成重建基础的操作。
Streamlined delivery and rebase (re-establish baseline).
提高了交付和重定基底(重新建立基线)的效率。
Cleartool rebase — Changes the configuration of the stream.
cleartool rebase——变更流的配置。
An analysis of the company consisting mostly of "lorem ipsum" text traditionally used by publishers to test the appearance of a layout.
公司的分析通常由传统上由出版商用于测试布局外观的“ lorem ipsum ”文本组成。

公司的分析通常由传统上由出版商用于测试布局外观的“ lorem ipsum ”文本组成。
它们被带到“一带一路”沿线国家。
They were brought to the countries along Belt and Road Routes.
对于“一带一路”倡议，你有何打算？
What do you plan to do for the Belt and Road Initiative?
出席一带一路论坛的领导人说了什么？
What did the leaders attending the Belt and Road Forum talk about?
